sentences.sentence: Autopsies showed five people had no disease at all.
sentences.translation: 尸检显示，有五个人根本没有病。

sentences.sentence: They don't do autopsies on women who die in childbirth here.
sentences.translation: 他们不会对死于难产的妇女进行尸体检查。

sentences.sentence: Two official autopsies failed to determine a cause of death.
sentences.translation: 官方的两次尸检均未查明死因。
